case.state: ~Estelle~?! I could ask you the same thing! What the hell are you doing playing strip poker?!
A hot spring? Okay, if there's some sort of peephole around here somewhere, somebody's gonna get fried.

Hehehe! I knew it! This place looks much too similar to Nam Cobanda for it to be a coincidence---there's clearly some sort of connection. If I study this area, I'll finally figure out what's going on in that---oh, right. I'm here for a strip poker game.
The name's Rita Mordio, blastia researcher extraordinaire. I've gotta warn you, I'm pretty good at games of chance.
Now this room's got an interesting aer distribution. If I just---oh, right. Hey everyone, Rita Mordio.
This place is really interesting. If I could just run some---huh? Oh, right, game's gonna start soon. Rita Mordio here, I'm playing.
I'm Rita Mordio, blastia researcher. You might've heard of me. Or not, I guess. In some weird extradimensional strip poker joint like this one, that's probably a lot less likely.
There's gotta be some connection between this place and Nam Cobanda. It's weird in a lot of the same ways, and they even have poker---oh yeah, that's what we're playing here. I'm Rita Mordio.
~Estelle~?! You really came here? I thought Judith was just making fun of me!
Hold on, what the hell?! You seriously want me to call you "~player~"?! Oh, you're a master all right... master of freaks!
Hold on, what the hell?! You seriously want me to call you "~player~"?! Oh, you're a mistress all right... mistress of freaks!
What the hell are you getting at, trying to call yourself "~player~"?! No way am I calling you anything that weird! Maybe I'll just call you what you really are---a freak!
Seriously? I can't believe some people come here without knowing that! What sort of pampered, airheaded little princess wouldn't bother to read the rules first?

Seriously? I can't believe some people come here without knowing that! What sort of pampered, airheaded little princess wouldn't---Wait, what? ~Estelle~? You didn't know?! I thought you were all about reading and rules!

I can't believe you of all people would come here, ~estelle~! You're just about the last person I'd expect to masturbate in front of complete strangers. Are you sure you know what you're getting into?
Yeah, whatever. I'm just gonna call you "punk" or something.
You don't wanna give us your name, huh, ~player~? Are you afraid everyone's gonna find out that you played this perverted game with us? That kind of makes you a wuss, but hey, it's not like I care.
Huh, you're actually asking us to call you... "~player~"? You know what? I kinda like that. You've gotta respect someone who's honest about who they are!
...So you're actually encouraging me to call you "~player~"? Fine by me, I guess. I take it this means you aren't gonna understand most of what I say, so I'll dumb it down for you from now on.
Oh, you're already pretty familiar with blastia, huh, ~player~? Well, great. In that case, I don't have to talk your ear off about them. Suits me just fine.
...Karol? Yeah, you don't look anything like the Karol I know, but... I'm probably gonna end up treating you like an idiot anyway. The association's just too strong, you know?

So why are we playing with this weirdo, again? Yeah, I'm talking to you, ~pervert~! This is a game for adults, okay? If you don't behave yourself, you're gonna find out what it feels like to get your goods set on fire.
Hey, I didn't expect to see so many researcher types around here! Maybe we can make this a conference! ...Nah, scratch that. Conferences suck.

Weird. The aer density in here isn't zero, which means my bodhi blastia should still function. I figured since this is another dimension there wouldn't be any at all... but I guess there's just enough that blastia will work? Hmm, that's kinda fishy...
This Inventory place sure is interesting. People from other worlds, weird spatiotemporal properties... I'm definitely looking forward to studying this place. Oh, and playing with you all.

Okay, I'm mostly here for the conversation, so don't be weird about this. How could I pass up the opportunity to study this sort of dimensional anomaly, where people from many different worlds converge?
Man, this place is weird. There's aer here for no obvious reason, and its distribution and density are like nothing I've seen before. Now that's interesting...

state.text: Hidden version of the "dumb player" line so that if the other line doesn't play, Rita will still skip her exposition for a player with one of the "dumb" names. Also turns off the player's "expert" status on blastia.

case.state: Hidden version of the normal line to "smart" names, which toggles playerExpert if the line itself doesn't play.
Oh, those are already pretty good. I only need one new card.
There's only one card missing for a perfect hand.
I guess I won't be trading any cards this round!
Why should I trade cards? This hand is already perfect!
Not every formula starts out perfect. This one requires ~cards.text~ other cards.
I see... I see... ~Cards.text~ should be fine...
I think I know what to do in this situation... Yes! ~Cards.text~ new cards, please!
I think I'll take ~cards.text~ this turn.
What am I supposed to do with those ~cards.text~? Give me new ones!
This time you'd better give me some good cards!
You can keep that rubbish! Give me ~cards.text~ new cards.
Are you mocking me? I want ~cards.text~ other cards!
Hopefully I can make something out of this junk I got dealt by swapping those ~cards.text~.
O power that lies at the root of all creation, o memory inscribed in ages past, hear my call and arise before me...
You know how sometimes you're working on a problem and everything just comes together? Now that's a beautiful feeling. You know what I'm talking about?
Hehehe! I hope the rest of you aren't feeling chilly, because you're gonna be wearing a lot less pretty soon!
I've got a whole hand full of nike blastia. Those are the ones that make you take off all your clothes.
I've deciphered the formula---now for the test!
See, I knew this game was gonna be easy!
Now to find out if my hypothesis is correct.
It's time for some payback!
Yeah, you're all gonna be sorry you messed with me!
You guys have fun stripping for me, okay?
First I get you to let your guard down, and then... zap!
See that, Judith? I told you I'd be great at this!
Whenever I try something, I'm immediately good at it!
I've noticed there are an awful lot of worlds with some kind of special tech they rely on for almost everything they do. Maybe even too much... You know what I mean, right?
It's nothing breakthrough worthy.
Sure, I've got a hand now, whatever.
Yeah, I really don't care about this hand.
This sure is a hand, and whatever results from it is gonna be a result.
Huh? Oh, yeah, I'm ready. These cards are so boring I forgot I had them for a second.
Funny resonance pattern in the aer just now. Huh? Oh yeah, we're still playing.
Hmm, the cards in this deck interact with the aer more than I'd have expected them to. Could they have some additional functionality?
It's not as good as planned, but hey, it'll do.
Sure, why not? You can't use the fancy artes all the time.

That's the uncertainty principle for you. With a hand like this, who the hell knows what'll happen.
---
...That's not actually the uncertainty principle, by the way.
So with this hand, I'd expect, uh... Yeah, I can't expect that much.
I'm pretty sure trying to make a prediction is a waste of time with something like this. I'd need some actual evidence for that.
Why are you looking at me? You better worry about your own hand!
The details of our hands are trivial. All that matters is whose clothing comes off.
Hey, have any of you seen a pink-haired, kinda naive-looking princess type hanging around here? She told me she was thinking of showing up, but I don't see her.
So if there's aer here, is there also mana? I'm not as good at analyzing that, but maybe if Estelle were around...

I wonder if this place is related to Nam Cobanda at all? There's people playing poker, there's all sorts of weird people and objects... If that island were influenced by other dimensions, it'd explain a lot.
There's gotta be all sorts of interesting fields of study I haven't heard of in other worlds, right? I'm trying to... diversify a bit, so it might be interesting to look into that.
Whatever. Who even cares?
Ah, a minor setback. I need to recalculate a few things.
It's not like I care. I didn't come here to keep my damn clothes on, I guess.
Huh, how easy would it be to set cards like these on fire? I'm just wondering.
You know, I'll bet these cards burn pretty easily. I'm just saying.
Eh, "losing" is just a social construct.
Whatever! This game is all luck anyway.
Look, I don't even care. Losing is fine, okay? I'm not worried about it at all!
Damn. This is ridiculous!
Ugh, I can't believe this garbage! What am I doing?
Ugh... Why should I care whether these cards are any good or not? They're just bits of paper with ink stuck on them. They're fundamentally meaningless.
"Games" are fake. It doesn't matter how I do in a game.
I'm not gonna be embarrassed. Embarrassment is just a bunch of chemicals in my head anyway.
Ugh, I have the urge to punch something! Where's Karol when you need him?
I don't know why you're wasting your breath on that land freak, ~estelle~. People like her don't listen to reason.
Y-You're just gonna tell her all about that, ~estelle~?! I-I mean, same for me, I guess...
Huh?! What is that supposed to mean, ~estelle~? I don't talk like that!

Seriously, ~estelle~? You're gonna go along with this? Well, you two knock yourselves out, I guess. I don't really understand the appeal of asking a powerful being who might not even exist to mold your actions to suit itself.
Hey! ~Estelle~, I'm right here, you know! Let's not forget all the times you've run off without thinking... You know, like to~background.time~!

I mean, it's a lot easier to help people with more power, ~estelle~. You know, like your healing artes... But, whatever. It makes sense you'd feel that way after all that crap we went through, I guess.
That's because it's not, ~estelle~. I'm pretty sure he's just being a dork like usual.
I couldn't really see you as a pilot anyway, ~estelle~. That sounds a bit too, uh... practical for you. It'd probably be better if you stick to books and magic.
You mean like dog food, ~estelle~? Weren't you defending Repede's cooking a while back? You said you were addicted to its "unusual flavor", didn't you?

W-Well, for a lot of that time, I wasn't even worried about you so much as how you could help my research, ~estelle~. I-I seriously didn't do anything all that special! You're the one always risking your life to help people you just met...

Eh, being friends with people is overrated. I know blastia won't take advantage of me or betray me, so I'd much rather spend time with them. I-I guess Estelle is pretty great for a human, though, even if she's naive as hell.

I mean, I'd really rather spend time with blastia than with people, ~kumatora~. Blastia won't betray me or take advantage of me... I dunno if there's any person who measures up to blastia, b-but I guess some come pretty close.

N-No, I didn't... I wasn't talking about you, ~estelle~, you know that! I don't think you're like that at all. I... Y-You can't just accept it when people say awful things about you! J-Just yell at me or something!

Seriously? I can't believe some people come here without knowing that! What sort of pampered, airheaded little princess wouldn't---Wait, what? ~Estelle~? You didn't know?! I thought you were all about reading and rules!

It figures you'd think the castle was the best place to visit, ~estelle~. I can't say that place is associated with the best memories of my life, and the nobles are all stuck-up jerks, but I'm glad it makes you happy, I guess.

Yeah, and it's full of stuffy guild weirdos obsessed with codes and laws and settling scores, always bickering over the tiniest little disagreement. Not only that, but since Don Whitehorse passed, it's somehow gotten even worse.

Yeah, or so we hope. I'm pretty sure forging a lasting peace between those two is gonna be harder than you're making it sound, ~estelle~, but at least we don't have to deal with it ourselves. We've got our own job to do.
Seriously? I can't believe some people come here without knowing that! What sort of pampered, airheaded little princess wouldn't bother to read the rules first?

There you go again, making promises you can't keep... I guess I won't tell you not to try. I don't really want to be alone for the rest of my life... But I've got you and the others, so is it really such a big deal?
Ugh, seriously? How persistent can you get? ...Look, ~estelle~, don't you think it's kind of a personal question? Let's just talk about it when we're back at the inn, okay?
If it's supposed to make you look like a idiot, ~mari_setogaya~, then it's working great.
Well, at least you're pretty cute with your hair like that, ~estelle~. I don't know why you put so much effort into keeping it brushed. Honestly, it looks better like that anyway.

Hey, whatever makes you happy, ~barbara~. Worshiping gods always seemed pretty weird to me, though. Even if supreme beings existed, why should their power mean they have judgment that's any better than a mortal's?
Oh yeah, I should share some more of my techniques for cultivating a calm mind with you, ~estelle~. With those, I can ignore just about anything that happens---no matter how obnoxious it is.
...Well, ~estelle~? Are you gonna leave, or what? If you are, you'd better do it soon, or some jerk's gonna end up whining about being blueballed.

You probably got the idea already, ~heris~, but I've been studying blastia ever since I was ten years old, and I'd say by now I understand them better than anyone. I mean, they need someone who understands them, right?

What would I change about my body? Eh, I don't even like this thing that much. I need it for my brain to survive, obviously, but taking care of it's a pain. I'd make it need less food and sleep so I could spend more time on research.

You probably know this already, but I'm still working through that Discourses on Aer book, ~estelle~. I'm convinced there's something in there we can use to live better in the world we're gonna create.
Uh... whatever makes you happy, ~yuno_uno~. If you happen to get a lucky streak now that you're losing, feel free to say it was because of your "potential", I guess.
Sorry, ~meia~, I don't have time for that. I specialize in blastia, not piloting whatever those things are. Besides, we're kinda busy right now, trying to prevent a global calamity and all.
I mean, the point of food is to restore your energy, right? It's all the same mush in your stomach, so I like foods that are easy to eat while you're doing something else, like sandwiches.

Spirits are definitely real, ~miki_miura~. Their formation has been possible ever since at least the invention of blastia---but thanks to my research, there's about to be more of them than ever before!

Y-You know, I don't name every single blastia I run into anymore, ~estelle~. It's probably a bad idea to get too attached to any of them... B-But, I remember what you and Judith said back in Aurnion, so...

I mean, undressing to bathe or change clothes isn't exactly erotic. We're just not used to it in this context yet. Look, it's fine, ~estelle~. You didn't make me uncomfortable, and I don't mind you looking, okay?
Y-Yeah, I guess so, ~estelle~. I... A-Are you really that interested? O-Of course, I'll also be trying to... {small}gulp!{!reset} J-Jeez, how the hell did it get to this point?!

state.text: Huh... Well, I was wondering if I should give an overview of what aer and blastia are since I keep talking about those, but you're an expert on blastia too, right, ~player~? In that case, you should do it. I can't really be bothered to right now.

case.state: If you like Philippides that much, I'd be happy to introduce you after the game, ~heris~. Just make sure to treat him with respect---I'm not gonna put up with anyone mistreating him.

If you really want to touch Philippides, maybe I'd let you after the game, ~heris~. You don't seem like the sort of person to damage equipment recklessly... But I'm still gonna have to supervise you to make sure.
What the hell is up with you? You seriously came here without even knowing all the rules?! Think, ~estelle~! Think before you sign up for strip poker with strangers!
Huh, that "cellular agriculture" stuff sounds pretty interesting, ~heris~. Then, could you grow a synthetic body part with that? That could have... some interesting applications.

state.text: Wh-What?! That book's clearly full of crap, ~estelle~! I wouldn't think someone was the real Hermes or Miska just because their name was the same! How stupid do they think I am?!
Wh-What?! Of course not, ~estelle~! I'm not gonna ignore someone's research accomplishments just because their name's the same as an idiot I know! What do the jerks who wrote that book take me for?!

case.state: I don't really understand what there is to appreciate. I mean, there's gotta be some sort of external world surrounding you while you're doing your research, sure, but I don't really bother with it once I understand its properties.

I mean, it's pretty important, ~heris~, but you sure can't expect it from most people. That's why I'd rather avoid people as much as possible and stick with blastia---I know they'll never betray me, at least.
Eh... yeah, sleep is important, I guess, but I don't much like it. Just more time I can't spend on my research... I usually keep working until I fall asleep.

I don't know about Earth, but there's plenty on Terca Lumireis. Most cities use all sorts of interesting blastia, such as barrier blastia to keep out monsters---or you could visit an aer krene if you want to study where aer comes from.
You really want us to pick a nickname for you when we just met you, ~kumatora~? Your name's not that hard to say, so I don't see the point.

state.text: So you aren't gonna tell us your name? What'd you say, "AG" for short? Sure, why not. But you know, I feel like pronouncing that a bit differently...

Ugh, are you confused when I talk about blastia and aer? Would you even understand if I explained it? Look, aer is magic stuff all over, and blastia are machines that use the magic stuff for, uh... magic. Okay, that better be good enough for you.
Well, I guess I should explain what I mean when I say stuff about aer and blastia, but... eh, the rest of you seem pretty smart. You'll figure it out.

case.state: I know that look on your faces. "What's Rita talking about? What's aer? What's a blastia?" Do I really have to be the one to explain it? Fine... I'll go over the basics. But I'm not one of those "blastia education" losers, okay?
I've still got my eye on you, ~pervert~! I don't trust someone like you in this game at all. You put one hand where it doesn't belong, and it's gonna get burned off!

Ugh... I can't believe I actually agreed to undress in the same room with someone like you, ~pervert~. B-But you're being pretty decent in your own way, just... honest. I g-guess I can respect that...
Okay, enough of that. Hey look, boobs! They're no different from the ones everyone has, so go on and look at them. I'm not gonna waste any more time being some sort of shy maiden.
Ugh, why the hell am I covering myself? They're just boring lumps of fat, so ogle them already if you're into that for some reason.
...Huh? Did you want me to say something about that device I just used? Look, it's just something I threw together a few days ago. I don't have to explain everything I do to you people, do I?
...Huh? That device I was using? It's just something convenient I threw together the other day, that's all. I don't need to tell you all about it, do I?

No, I'm not gonna take off the bodhi blastia on my neck. I've already got the maximum number of items allowed, and there's nothing that could happen in this game that would make me take him off even if I didn't.
What, the choker on my neck? Look, I've actually bathed with my bodhi blastia before, so I'm definitely not gonna take him off for some strip poker game. I'm not that much of a sore loser anyway.

state.text: Okay, I could talk all day about blastia if I wanted to, but I don't want to. We've covered the basics, so now you know what I mean if I mention any of that stuff. Lecture over.

...So... it's obvious from what I said, right? Blastia are just... fundamentally incompatible with natural life. The only thing we can do is... How the hell did I get onto this topic? I was just explaining how aer works, and... I'm done with this.
Okay, that's probably enough lecturing for right now. I already covered the most important parts, and I dunno if you'd understand much more than that anyway.

Eh... okay, you all look pretty bored, so I'll stop there. I kind of went off on a tangent and didn't really cover most of the important stuff, but I'm guessing you don't really give a damn. Or at least, I sure don't.

Well, now you know what blastia are and where they come from, so let's end there. I guess I didn't tell you much about the different types of blastia, but, eh... you don't look like you care all that much. And let me tell you, I sure don't.

Huh, you all look pretty bored. Well, I kinda got sidetracked talking about formulas, but I guess now you know what I do. It doesn't really look like you wanna know any more than that, so I'll shut up.

case.state: Seriously? It's nothing but men? Eh, whatever. At least it'll still be intellectually interesting. Just don't come crying to me if I'm taking notes on your genitals instead of oohing and aahing.

You're seriously the only man here, ~man~? Are you some pervert who just wants to watch girls undress? I hate to break it to you, but you're subject to the rules just like we are... So you'd better be ready to give as good as you get!

D-Damn it, how am I supposed to lecture under these conditions? If you wanna know more about aer and blastia then just ask me outside a strip poker game, like a normal person. I'm done with explaining it to you.

Okay, Blastia 101. Aer---that's A-E-R, I know, it sounds just like A-I-R, you get used to it---is a substance found everywhere on Terca Lumireis. Blastia use aer to produce magical effects, such as city barriers that keep out monsters.
Hey, the fewer humans in our game, the better! ...A-As long as it's not just me, I mean.

Blastia cores use formulas to convert aer to energy, and then bodies direct the energy. Bodies are easy to make, but we don't know how to build most cores, so we have to excavate those from ruins. They're precious, so treat them with respect.

I study blastia formulas, which use mathematical models to gather aer for a blastia core. It's important to use the correct formula, or else you could harm the blastia. That's why you have to customize your formulas to the situation.

Other blastia we use include bodhi blastia that enable casting spells or using weapon artes, plus blastia that manipulate water, produce light, drive ships... And they deserve our care in return for all they do, so don't take them for granted.

Oh, I should explain where aer comes from. Crystal formations called aer krenes produce it in response to global changes in the aer. Unfortunately, large local changes also affect a krene's output... That's a problem with no easy solution.

Blastia use aer up faster than any natural process, so they can cause nearby krenes to overproduce. That leads some krenes to dry out and turn their surroundings to wasteland, and it can mutate monsters into horrific forms.

You need to decipher any formulas you didn't create to make sure they actually do what you want. You can get away with using some blastia without messing with that at all, but you really shouldn't, so just suck it up and learn the theory.

It's a pretty dumb idea to go to an aer krene without a good reason, by the way. Aer in high concentration is really bad for you, and at krenes it gets so thick you can see it. I only visit them because they're so important for my research.
Wh-Why are you making so many weird assumptions, ~estelle~? You don't even know if a man is what I'm looking for in the first place. Besides, like I told you, that's not why I came here.

Wh-Where the hell did that come from, ~estelle~? Do you think I came here to find a date or something? And why do you assume a man's even what I'd be looking for? Sometimes I wonder what's going on in that head of yours.

Yeah, you're making way too many assumptions, ~estelle~. Seriously, I didn't come here to find a date. It's more like... curiosity, you know? When you find out somewhere like this exists, it's hard not to be interested.
Huh? No, I'm wearing mismatched ones on purpose, ~mari_setogaya~. It just helps me increase my clothing's aer conductance so I can cast spells better, that's all.

You're seriously gonna keep referring to yourself in the third person like that? Eh, whatever... In a manner of speaking, ~cagliostro~. I'm not really part of the Brave Vesperia guild, but I travel with them so much I'm sort of an honorary member.

Sure, fine by me, ~cagliostro~. Aer exists naturally all over Terca Lumireis, and is an abundant source of energy living things depend on. Blastia are just devices that convert and channel that energy for some benefit.

I mean, both, ~meia~. "Blastia"'s a pretty general term, like "clothing". All devices that use cores and formulas to convert aer into energy are called blastia, and they use that energy for anything from magical attacks to purifying water.

Oh, I specialize in blastia research, ~heris~---devices that run off of aer to generate power and magical effects. In Terca Lumireis, we use them for pretty much everything, but especially for barriers to keep monsters out of cities.
What is that supposed to mean, ~estelle~? I'm just here to blow off some steam and study this place. Haven't you seen how interesting it is?

Wh-What?! I... ~Estelle~, how am I supposed to run into someone like that here? What sort of meaningful relationship could you possibly build with someone over a strip poker game? Or even multiple games!
Didn't you ask me the same thing this morning, ~estelle~? Eh, whatever. It's coming along okay. I'm still figuring out how to adjust it for small, cuboid rooms, since it eats up a lot of aer.

Yeah, that's not the most flattering way you could have put it... Look, being ashamed isn't really the issue. I never used to spend a lot of time around strangers with my clothes on, let alone without them.

Damn it, ~estelle~! I want you to stop asking questions. I'm doing fine. Unlike you, I signed up for this game with full knowledge of what was involved, and I'm perfectly prepared to go through with it!
Okay, this "observing" thing is starting to get weird, ~estelle~. Y-You've been staring at me ever since I took my ~clothing~ off! Is this really necessary to use that "intuition" of yours?
Come on, ~estelle~, I'm not distressed. And stop averting your eyes like that, it's silly. Anyway, we can't expect to go through our whole lives together without any problems at all, you know?
Uh... hi? Is there something you wanna ask, ~saki~? I don't really know what to do with just "nice to meet you". Could you get to the point?
...Are you seriously gonna keep staring at me like that, ~sucrose~? I haven't even taken anything off yet, you know...
W-Well... That sure came out of nowhere, didn't it, ~sucrose~? L-Look, I'm not stupid. I'm perfectly aware of what happens in this game, i-it's just not my... primary motivation for coming.
What's that supposed to mean, ~kumatora~? I'm just trying to win, like everyone else here. I mean, it's not like there aren't any incentives to do that, you know?
Why the hell should I care about that, ~natsuki~? I'm doing practical research in this outfit, not applying for the next Miss Ilyccia competition.
Look, I'm just trying to make conversation here, ~natsuki~. What else do you want me to talk about? Some sort of philosophical treatise on why I'm taking off my other stocking next?

I guess I do some alchemy, ~natsuki~, but that's more useful for treating materials and building blastia bodies and stuff. I mostly work with formulas that generate magical effects, like spells to use against monsters.

Eh, I guess, ~natsuki~? Who knows, maybe we'll run into some important poetry warning us about the downfall of civilization due to aer imbalances. It's not gonna stop the imbalances, but at least we can feel bad about it.
Huh? Is there a reason you're looking at me like that, ~ringo_ando~? I mean, I don't really care either way, but...
Oh, it's me? Yeah, I'm gonna take off my stocking. It'll be boring as hell, so let's talk about something else, okay?
So my other stocking, then. Cool, whatever. What do I do, you ask? Well, I'm gonna tell you whether you asked or not.
So yeah, most of the time I use magic to help out in combat. We end up fighting a lot of monsters, since we're traveling outside the barriers.

Oh yeah, I guess I'm technically a researcher at an Imperial blastia research laboratory. I'm not really working for the Empire these days, though. Honestly, I never wanted all that politics in my research to begin with.
Wait, no way! All I've got left is... No, no, I've still got the sash.
Damn! This is getting ridiculous. Why the hell is this game going so fast? ...Yeah, I don't know what that's supposed to mean, either.
Ugh, no, not already! Come on! ...What the hell are you all looking at?! I still want to play, so don't make such a big deal out of it!
...Okay, okay. Look, I'm not stupid. I knew this was probably going to happen. The odds are against all of us in this dumb game.
L-Look, ~estelle~, I just didn't know what to say to that! She wasn't even talking about anything! Come on, don't look at me like that...
It's pretty impressive that you manage to get to completely different species before you even consider all the human options. You do know it's possible for women to love other women, right?

That's a lot of flowery language just to say that it's pretty tempting to get to watch attractive strangers undressing and playing with themselves in front of you... But yeah, now you're on the right track.
Yeah, that's a decent way of putting it. There's certainly plenty of "intermingling" going on. But lives aren't the only things they're touching here, you know.
Yeah, that's not gonna happen. Come on, you must know life doesn't work the way it does in all those novels you read. Why would anyone worth connecting with like that come here in the first place?

I mean, you can get by with them, sure. But your spells get a lot more powerful if you move past memorizing stuff out of books and dig into the theory behind it. You get used to doing math in your head while you walk.

No, no, no. This is completely different from that. How can I trust a bunch of perverted strangers standing around and ogling me in a place like this? I mean... ugh. I want to trust them, but I just...

Do you really think I don't understand all that? L-Look, I appreciate it. But what would help me the most is for you to calm down and stop asking me questions when I'm trying to concentrate. That's all I'm saying.
Yeah, my "posture and facial expressions". That's definitely a good description of where you've been staring all this time. Didn't you say I was the one who didn't have any shame?
I mean, that just seems like good general advice. Besides, I've got you to thank for that foundation anyway. We're only even having this conversation because you didn't stop prodding me, you know?

Not exactly. Aer's basically a substance, but it's easily converted into energy by various processes. It exists in living things too and heavily affects their growth, so all life depends on aer being in the proper balance.
Oh, that. Yeah, on Terca Lumireis, we use blastia to produce magical effects. They operate by consuming aer, which occurs naturally all over the world.

"Style" is a waste of time. I carefully calibrated this outfit to maximize my aer conductance. It has to be asymmetrical, or else there's nothing to counterbalance... Whatever, it's not like you're gonna understand anyway.
I don't see what's so "simple" about stories that aren't even true in the first place. It just makes the world more complicated than it needs to be.

Wh-Who says I'm not enjoying it? It's just not the main reason I'm here, that's all. Look, I'm pretty sure we've all got some similar motivations for playing this game, so why do we have to bring it up?
Like I probably said somewhere back there, I'm Rita Mordio. I'm a mage from Aspio, the so-called "City of Scholars"... Though "scholar" is putting it pretty generously for some of those guys.

I used to spend most of my time in Aspio, but somehow I ended up traveling the world with Estelle and Yuri and... You know what, there's no point in me telling you their names, because you have no clue who they are.
Anyone can learn magic with a bodhi blastia and a bit of effort, but it seems like most people don't bother. So it's mostly me blasting the monsters with attack spells. Suits me just fine, though.

The Empire and the guilds are always going at each other. I don't really give a damn who my research is benefiting, as long as it isn't hurting anyone. I'd rather have the freedom to work on topics that I think are important.

Look, I know this is kind of pervert central, but the main reason I'm here is that I couldn't turn down the opportunity to talk to people from completely different realities. All that other stuff is... well, it's secondary.

L-Look, it's not like I actually mind stripping like this. I really don't give a damn what you do or don't see, as long as you're not some sort of slavering, perverted old freak like Raven. Just behave yourselves!
I'm just not used to doing this, okay? I'm a private person. I didn't even really talk to people unless I had to... I mean, until I met Estelle and Yuri and everyone. Whatever.

It's kind of a relief, anyway. I've never done something like this with strangers, but now I'm used to it and it won't bother me anymore. Getting upset is a waste of my time, so the less stuff that upsets me, the better.

Yeah, that sounds about right. You must know by now Imperial novels are full of crap more often than not, so I'm not surprised they'd portray that as something villainous. Well, either way, I can promise you I'm pretty real.
Well, look who's talking. Come on, ~estelle~, I'm a typical human being with perfectly ordinary sexual urges. Are you really that surprised that I'm not unusual?
Ugh... I can't believe this. Seriously, ~estelle~... what the hell are you doing somewhere like this?!

Th-Thanks, but that's more of an anomaly than anything. I'm lucky I met someone like you in the first place, and I don't see any reason to expect I'll find someone else like that anytime soon. So don't get your hopes up, okay?

state.text: Eh, that's okay, ~estelle~. Your magic is fine the way it is. Sure, it'd be better if you customized your formulas more, but I don't really care as long as it helps us stay alive, you know? ...Yeah, just take all that stuff where I told you earlier, Philippides.

case.state: Yeah, it is a lot better with you here. I'm still not sure what you're doing here, but I'm glad you came. Besides, if anyone bothers us, I'll just blast them to smithereens, so there's nothing to worry about!
Sure, whatever you say. I guess that wouldn't be... Uh, ~estelle~... You really are keeping a close eye on me. E-Exactly what about the inside of my ~clothing~ is so interesting to you?
Damn it, ~estelle~! You've seen them so many times before! Why are you suddenly so interested in them now?!
...Yeah... that's probably a good idea. Let's have a talk later to~background.time~, ~estelle~. I'll look forward to it.

state.text:
Yeah? Here's some simple language for you, ~natsuki~---fuck off.
...Don't listen to her, Philippides. Just go ahead and carry all that to the coordinates I programmed you with, okay?

case.state: Sure, I'd be happy to talk about it with you. I dunno how useful it'll be if there's not any aer on your world, though. I'm guessing you might already have known about it.

Anyway, I'm along for the ride because there's interesting things along the way. You've got weird blastia, aer krenes, an opportunity to... There's some unique people in our group, you know? I've gotten a lot of research done.

Of course, Estelle does a bit of magic too. She's really good at healing artes and holy magic... But she doesn't really do them like I do. She's kind of a special case... Actually, on second thought, let's not open up that can of worms.

That's another reason it's been nice to travel around, so I don't have to worry about... Okay, let's see. Goggles, lenses, pens, uh... Yeah, that's everything. Take all that stuff to the coordinates I gave you, okay, Philippides?

One of them thought blastia couldn't cause global aer excess, because "blastia use up aer, they don't produce it". But overuse of aer stimulates aer krenes to produce more! Can't these guys work out a problem beyond the first few steps?!

That doesn't mean I'm not ready to handle creeps, by the way. This sash conducts aer well for me, so it makes a pretty good weapon---not that I need anything but my bodhi blastia. So look, but don't touch, okay?
...What's up with that face? Don't just stand there staring at me like that... It's not even anything that special!

Hey, I don't want your pity, though. Blastia will never betray me, so I'd rather spend time with them than people anyway. I guess it's nice to be friends with people too... But I sure as hell don't need it!
And hey, I guess the rest of you seem pretty reasonable about it. You're keeping your hands to yourself, at least. Well, good for you. I'm---this really isn't too bad.

What even are you, ~bobobo~? I've been analyzing your effect on the aer, and... I-I tried to calculate the aer density near your head, and it came out as some dumb poem about not giving someone up?! It's not possible!
Okay, let me get this straight. You play Uno professionally? Uno? Seriously?!
Well, let's see what you got. You're not gonna chicken out, right?
Looks like you're up, ~name~. Go wild, I guess.
You'd better be prepared to do this, ~name~. I'm not gonna comfort you or anything.
Too bad, ~name~. Let's find out how tough you really are.
Anything good for us, ~name~? It's okay if it's not, as long as you don't mind me doing math or something instead of watching you.
Okay, ~name~, this had better be good.
Well, go on, ~name~. I'm not the only one stripping in this game, you know.
You'd better be ready with something good, ~name~.
You're not gonna throw a fit or anything, right? Good.
Okay, but if this turns out to be a waste of time, I'm gonna stop caring.
...Someone lost? Oh, it's ~name~... Fine, go for it...
I can't believe you're still stripping... Eh, whatever. Knock yourself out!
Sure, we can go to ~name~ for a bit. I'm just gonna keep working if it's not worth watching, though.
Huh, I guess I could study ~name~'s anatomy real quick. If he gives us anything worth studying, that is.

Seriously? You're comparing her to a character from some book of yours, ~estelle~? She just looks like a common thug, if you ask me. At least we shouldn't have a hard time beating her up if she tries anything.
When we... Hold on, ~estelle~! "Gave birth"?! You don't have to put it like that!
What're you talking about, ~estelle~? If she really has something to say to you, don't you think she'd say it?
Why are you being so polite to her, ~estelle~? Come on, you can't tell me you don't see how suspicious she is. Pirates steal valuables from enemy ships... You know that, right?

I guess it figures you'd admire that, ~estelle~. There's definitely something up with her, what with the way the aer's reacting to her body, but whatever it is, I doubt it's quite as impressive as she claims.
Eh, she'll probably tell you you're not missing much, ~estelle~. I learned way more about blastia from studying them on my own than from listening to jerks who only think they understand them.
So what's the deal with you again? You're some sort of street thug with that "Magma" gang you were talking about? What're you doing somewhere like this instead of running around mugging people?
Wish fulfillment, huh? I guess it's pretty obvious why ~player~ invited you here... Well, I don't really care either way, so go for it, ~mari_setogaya~...
...So, to not give up? I don't see why you need a god to help you do that, ~barbara~. I'm pretty sure that's just called being an adult.
Without... hold on, what? What do you mean there's too much water?
Yeah, I don't really have high hopes for this. But hey, whatever floats your boat, ~aqua_grunt~.
So you won't tell us your real name, you're dressed like a pirate, and you're talking about this "Team Aqua" that's clearly some kind of criminal gang... Why should we trust you again, ~aqua_grunt~?

Hey, you. ~Natsuki~, I mean. What's up with this poetry stuff anyway? It's just communicating badly. Why'd anyone want to obscure meaning behind a wall of flowery language instead of coming out and saying what you're saying?

So why do you follow this god of yours anyway? What's he done for you that merits this sort of dedication, ~barbara~? I mean, if everyone devotes themselves to a person like that, they're basically a dictator, right?
Huh, I didn't really expect to meet another researcher here. What's your specialty, ~heris~? Pretty sure there aren't blastia where you come from, so I assume it's not that.

Okay, ~estelle~, I really don't think it was a good idea for you to come here, but... if you're gonna be here, I'm not gonna let you go through it alone. S-So... look, what I mean is, I'm here to support you, okay?
So why'd you decide to come here anyway, ~estelle~? Did you lose a bet or something? Nah, you wouldn't even make bets like that to begin with.

You know, you really have grown a lot since we first met, ~estelle~. Remember when we went to Capua Nor, with that corrupt jerk Ragou in charge? You couldn't even believe an Imperial official could behave that way.
You know, we don't really have a lot of overlap in the sorts of books we read, ~estelle~. I mean, we both read a lot, but I don't think we've ever read something together. It might be fun sometime.
Okay, ~estelle~, this is what we've all been waiting for---I-I mean, in a general sort of way. I haven't been waiting for it or anything... Anyway, how're you feeling?
J-Jeez... ~Estelle~, are you gonna be okay? You look pretty overwhelmed. Y-You don't have to keep playing, you know. If you leave and anyone gets mad at you about it, I'll blow them up!
...So are you gonna ask ~player~ to help with this too, ~estelle~? You know, since ~player.ifMale(he's|she's)~ so enthusiastic about helping you.
Okay, seriously, ~cagliostro~, what's with you? There's no way someone who founded an entire field of study is actually this juvenile. Why the hell are you acting like some peppy little girl?

~Cagliostro~, huh? Pretty sure Yuri ran into you in some other world he visited. He said you were a "strange little girl with delusions of grandeur", but that your "alchemy stuff" was "no joke". That sound about right to you?
What's with that communication device you have, ~meia~? It barely interacts with the aer at all, yet you're clearly talking with someone over long distances. How is that even possible?
Jeez, ~saki~, are you sure you came to the right place? You look like you might run and hide at any moment. You do know what we're playing here, right?

What's up with that brooch, anyway? That thing's causing all sorts of weird resonance patterns in the aer, but it's not actually taking in any aer, so it's not a blastia... So then where's all that power coming from, ~sucrose~?

...Yeah, the resonances are definitely centered around her head... She's not taking in aer, but she's definitely got some sort of abnormal power output going on, it's just quiescent right now... Okay, ~kumatora~, what's up with your brain?

...Something funny's definitely going on with ~mari_setogaya~... She's producing more resonances in the aer than I'd expect. But she's too smart to be a monster... I mean... hmmm. That is true, right?
Any other research projects you've worked on, ~heris~? Or is it mostly just the geothermal power stuff you mentioned earlier?
So what sort of world do you come from again, ~ringo_ando~? Puyo battles and weird forms of magic... Sounds like it must have pretty different physical laws from mine, that's for sure.
W-Well, I guess you're probably out of the boring stuff by now, huh, ~name~? That's... fine.
Okay, well... Just pick whatever you want, ~name~? I-I guess there's not a lot of options.
O-Oh, it's ~name~. Hey, don't expect sympathy from me. Th-This is how the game goes, right?
If the goal is just to win, i-it doesn't matter how many items the loser has left, so it's fine if it's just ~name~ again.
Oh... W-Well, good. You're... clearly not going to waste our time, a-and my time is important.
Oh, so it's your turn, ~name~? Sure, I'm watching.
Well, that's a win for me. For everyone except ~name~, I guess.
Are you taking off anything interesting this round, ~name~? If not, just let me know so I can ignore you until next time.
So what's next, ~name~? Are you gonna take out a hairpin or something? Because I'm not watching that.
You know what they say---do unto others as you'd have them do unto you. And just so you know, whenever I take off some dumb trinket, I'd like all of you not to give a damn about it.
Hey, this is win-win from my perspective. Either ~name~ does something devastatingly erotic, or I ignore it and solve equations in my head.
Strip whatever you want, ~name~. I'm not gonna judge you. I'm just gonna stop watching if you pick something boring.
So what are you taking off, ~name~? No, no, no. Don't actually tell me, or I won't be nearly as bored when I find out it's your piercings or something.
...Oh, it's ~name~'s turn... I mean, I guess that's fine.
I-It's none of my business what you strip, ~name~. Just do whatever you want.
Oh, ~name~ lost... Y-Yeah, that's pretty much what I was expecting in the first place...
W-Well, go ahead, ~name~. What are you waiting for?
S-Sure, ~name~'s turn... Seems like a pretty logical way for things to go, right?
Y-Yeah, okay... I might as well watch ~name~ for a bit. I-I mean, there's not anything better to do...
Oh... hey there, ~name~... You feel like helping me out?
Yeah, okay... Come on, ~name~, make it good...
Sure, why not? It's a little late, but I've got some enthusiasm left.
I'm more than happy to get more clothes off of ~name~. You know. Science and all.
Hey, ~name~! Anatomy's not really my field, but I'm trying to branch out, you know? So give me something nice to examine.
Hey, I won't say no to studying ~name~ a little more.
You wanna impress me, ~name~? You just might be able to pull it off.

Ties are so statistically improbable, and yet nothing even happens when you get one? It's like you manage to excavate some new kind of blastia core, but all it does is make funny squeaking noises or something.
Okay, I guess that figures. No offense, but I'm not gonna bother watching you take off some ~clothing~ you brought. Huh, maybe I'll catch up on all that research I've been putting off...
Okay. Now, for this expression...
This'll be a little bit rough doing it in my head, but you know what? It'll be a good exercise.
Okay, so the question is, can I factor this expression? I'll bet I can factor it...
Okay, I've technically already deciphered this formula... But I bet I can find a more elegant solution. Maybe even generalize it to arbitrary effective radii...
I'd better be careful with this one. I can't just ignore the z-axis this time, since I'm aiming at the ground...
This one should be easy, right? There's no way I'll screw this up.
I know I can factor this thing. Even under these conditions, I can at least do that much properly, right?
Even if I'm really distracted, surely I can at least handle this subformula, right?
Oh, and if I rub like this... That's pretty good too...
...It's nice not to have any interruptions...
Ah, so much easier to think clearly with all that taken care of.
I can definitely factor this one. This'll be easy!
Man, why did I solve this subformula like that? I've got a much better idea for how to do it...
Starting off strong with some ~clothing~ you grabbed for an extra layer, huh? Well, whatever. Maybe I can get some work done while everyone's doing stuff like that.
...In that case, the integral of the aer density from 0 to r is equal to the total mass of the... hold on. Do I need a 2 or not?
...And then, check to make sure the units cancel out... great! Finished that one!
...Hey, that wasn't so bad! And I bet I could even get rid of this last term by setting x = sin(w) or something.
There we go! Just like how Jameson did it. I mean, I have that solution memorized anyway, but I thought it'd be fun to derive it again.
Good, good. That takes care of that term. Now, for the next one... Oh, right, we're still playing.
...But how can the total mass of aer bounded by the sash possibly be more than the total aer mass in the room? Ugh, I forgot a minus sign, didn't I? D-Damn it, I can't work under these conditions!
...Ugh, the units don't cancel? Why the hell don't the units cancel?! Damn it, I can't think straight!
...Damn! If I just had my copy of Jameson, this'd be easy! She solves this exact problem in chapter 3, I swear!
...Wait... damn it! This isn't the radius in the plane, it's the radius in three dimensions! How the hell could I miss something like that?!
...Argh, what the hell?! There's no way the power can be negative! How did I even get a result like that?!
...That's pretty much the best spot...
Oooh... Man, that feels nice...
...And the units all cancel, of course! Hehehe, I'm a genius!
...Huh. Will you look at that? Jameson made a mistake here. Well, assuming I'm not just remembering it wrong. I'll have to double-check when I've got my copy again.
...And if the radius is about two meters... Yeah, that's exactly what I should be getting back. Great!
Uh, ~estelle~... I don't really think that's what she's talking about...
Wh-What are you apologizing to me for?! See, you're worrying about people "liking" you, you apologize at the drop of a hat... You're just gonna get taken advantage of at a place like this!
Why would I want to express emotions in the first place? What good does getting angry or unhappy do me, or anyone else for that matter? It just gets in the way of accomplishing anything.

Okay, but you remember what happens if you lose, right? You'll have to do that in front of everyone here. Including me. A-And if you don't, then I'll be doing it in front of you, and... J-Jeez, that's...

Okay, but don't forget---if you lose, you'll have to do the forfeit yourself, in front of everyone here. A-And then both of us will have seen the other doing it right in front of them, a-almost like we... J-Jeez, that's...
That's just how it is in the real world, you know? Things don't get tied up nice and neat like they do in those books you read, and you can't ever know for sure if you actually did the right thing.
...Sustainable energy... You mean, methods of energy production that don't waste natural resources? It's a pity we didn't have anyone working on that. What're you using for power, then?

Hey, I'm not obscuring anything. Science is complicated, so you've gotta use complicated language to describe it---there's no way around it. That's exactly why it's important to word things as simply as you can.

Yeah, well, they might not. I mean, the sort of person who comes here probably just wants to see you playing with yourself. Forget about trying to make anyone "like" you and worry about your own well-being.
Ha, wouldn't we all like that! Well, it's too bad life's not that simple, and I don't think I'd trust some god to whisper their idea of morality in my ear.
The ocean hasn't stolen anything from you, you idiot! It provides food and. indirectly, rainwater, and it's a vital part of the ecosystem. What the hell is your problem?
What the hell is wrong with you? Water is one of the four fundamental elements! The ocean provides seafood, rainwater, naval commerce and transportation... Are you guys seriously this overpopulated?
Whoa... Hold on... What are you even doing, ~monika~? It's just...
And how exactly do you propose to do that? Lofty goals aren't much use without some way to achieve them. You do have a plan, right?
Okay, what the hell do you mean by "the ocean's might"? Are you summoning some sort of sea monster to smite the land dwellers or something? I really don't think that's a good idea...
Huh? Well, yeah, rising ocean levels would be a problem, but that's not a good reason to get rid of the ocean as it is now!
Yeah? Just your ~clothing~, that's it? Eh, it's not like I didn't bring things like that too, but... I'm just gonna work on research stuff until you're done. I'm not a huge fan of watching paint dry.
Just promise me you're really ready to go through with the forfeit. Remember, it's certain that one or the other of us will have to... W-Wow, yeah, and the other one will be watching, or even...
Traveling with us, you've learned a lot about how harsh and unpleasant the world can be. But despite everything, you're still so optimistic. I guess that's just how you are.
Okay, this is just some trig identity crap, right? There's no way I can mess up anything that simple...
Ugh... I know Jameson solved this one in Classical Aerdynamics. I thought I had that solution memorized!
Which coordinate system do I need to use here? Cylindrical? No, there's symmetry around both axes, but then the ground...
Ugh... this is gonna require integration by parts, isn't it? How the hell am I supposed to do that in my head with everyone looking at me?
...So... this'll be easy if I just use spherical coordinates, right? This one's gotta be easy...
...Even if she's not really undressing, ~name~'s pretty cute...
...It's just nice to be around ~name~, even if she doesn't take anything off...
...~Name's~ pretty hot, isn't she? Too bad she's not gonna strip after all...
...I guess name doesn't need to take stuff off for me to want to watch her...
Now, for this one, if I remember my trig identities... Which I do, naturally...
Okay... so for this part of the formula, I should probably use spherical coordinates...
Do I need to integrate this one by parts? ...Nah, just need to simplify a little first...
Pretty sure Jameson solved this same class of subformula in Classical Aerdynamics... Now, what did she do again?
Now, if the room is large enough, we can just worry about the aer in some sphere of radius r... So that implies...
Sit back, relax, do math... This is my idea of a good time!
Too bad I didn't bring Classical Aerdynamics with me but, eh, I've got most of that memorized anyway...
Okay, this is easy. It's just some basic trigonometry. I think I've got most of it solved already...
Okay, that gives me the expression for the aeric potential. Now, I just need to solve Laplace's equation...
Hey, the aeric potential's just gonna go to zero at the boundary here. That'll make things way easier...
Hmmm, that could be useful to investigate... I'd definitely be interested in seeing some of your notes and records when you've got the chance, ~heris~.

state.text: What is wrong with you? I just told you the benefits we get from having that water, and that's just scratching the surface! Why don't we get rid of the land too because there's earthquakes, you... you land freak!

What? You're getting rid of land?! How the hell would that balance anything?! It's just gonna unbalance things even further by destroying the habitats of land creatures, too! What sort of idiot sea freak devises a plan like that?!

...That's your plan? Give land "back" to the ocean, which could just as easily cause more ecological damage? Do you seriously think it's that simple? You're just a bunch of idiot sea freaks without a real plan at all!

case.state: B-But... you really don't see any issue with that, ~estelle~? Th-That would be... I mean, I guess it wouldn't be so bad. It's just a bunch of dumb, arbitrary social rules... A-All just nonsense we made up!

Oh, really? Hey, whatever works for you, I guess. Is that what you were doing, whenever you needed all that time to yourself to make a decision? Thinking about what your Amber Boyfriend would've done?
Oh yeah, I guess that would make sense. There's huge lava caverns underneath all the aer krenes we've discovered, so something like that's probably possible on our world as well.

state.text: That's your reasoning? Sea monsters are scary, so let's eliminate the entire damn ocean? How's it even possible to be this dumb?! Hey, you better pay attention to me, you... you land freak!

case.state: Good, at least there's one bit to it that's not vague enough to turn up in a self-help book. I guess it's nice this wind god of yours doesn't expect you to put up or shut up, at least.

O-Oh, then you've got... The rest of you looks pretty humanoid, but I guess I shouldn't have assumed... {small}Y-You're not part cat or anything, are you? Or some other animal, that's just an example.{!reset}
It's gone?! B-But... there wasn't any effect on the aer when you did that! It just... went away? That violates Spyros's Third Law of Aerdynamics! What the hell?!
Yeah, no offense, but that's not exciting enough for anyone to care about. If we're just gonna waste our time for a bit, I might as well get some work done while I wait.
...A-Anyway, it'll be pretty extreme, ~estelle~. But I'll look out for you as best I can.
After all that, I feel like you should be a bit more cynical, but... I dunno. It's kinda nice that you haven't changed that much, too.
...Yeah, of course! That whole left side is just equivalent to a hyperbolic cotangent function. No problem!
...Good, good. And then those sine functions cancel... Looking pretty nice!
...And that means the angle of the aerflow vector is... ~rng(11-79)~ degrees! Yeah, that sounds reasonable, right?
Hah! That one was actually a lot simpler than it looked. Just gotta remember your Legendre polynomials!
...Yeah, that works. I doubt I can simplify the formula much more than that, anyway.
...So then since sine squared minus cosine squared is equal to 1... Wait, no... It's plus, isn't it? Or is it? Agh, how can I not remember this?! This game is really messing me up!
...Oh, for... how the hell did Jameson do this one?! I think she just said it was trivial... Well, it's not fucking trivial!!
...Damn... I should have used cylindrical coordinates from the start, shouldn't I? Ugh! This is supposed to be easy!
...Damn it! What did I do wrong? This would give an infinite aerflow into the sash! What the hell?!
...What the hell is wrong with me?! This was such an easy calculation... Damn it, ~player~, stop looking at me like that!
That's it. That feels really good, you know...
Oh, I like that motion... You should do that one again...
Thanks, girl. That feeling's the best... Oh, I'm not talking to ~name~.
Oooh, that was a really nice pattern right there, girl... Kinda caught me off guard... Oh, not you, ~name~...
...And with that, it all reduces down to just a single sine function in rho sub i. Beautiful!
...Great, that term's taken care of. Hey, and I can apply this result to that other subformula, too... Huh, I've been making this more complicated than it needs to be.
...Oh yeah, I guess that term cancels. Actually, so does this one... Wait, is this whole section of the subformula just zero? Hey, I guess that'd make sense, wouldn't it?
...Okay, and then next, we've got these terms... Actually, no, that's all gonna cancel. I don't even need to bother with it.
...Huh, there's really only one term left? Wow, I didn't expect the solution to be that simple... Better put some test values in just to be sure.
Hey, ~name~. You're not gonna just chicken out when it's time to bring out the goods, are you? You'd better not.
What sort of aer conductance ~clothing.ifPlural(do those|does that)~ ~clothing~ have for you, ~name~? Eh, you probably don't know what I'm talking about.
Taking off your ~clothing~, huh? Sounds like a waste of time to me, but sure, I'll humor you and watch.
Is this some sort of boring-off competition, where we're all trying to be as boring as possible? Hey, I know I'm doing it too. I'm just saying.
Real gutsy move, ~name~, taking off your ~clothing~ right in front of us.
You better be prepared to take off more than that, ~name~. Your ~clothing~ ~clothing.ifPlural(aren't|isn't)~ the last thing~clothing.ifPlural(s|)~ you'll strip this game.
Yeah, yeah. Take off your ~clothing~, or whatever...
Well, looks like someone's winning the boring-off. Have fun with that while I'm stripped down over here, ~name~.
Is it erotic for you to take off some ~clothing~ or whatever in front of half-naked girls, ~name~? No offense, but I'm pretty sure that makes you a freak.
Hey, why not. Rub it in, see if I care.
Sure, sure. Don't think I won't catch up to you, ~name~.
I'll bet that takes a lot of guts right about now, ~name~. Try it when you're in my condition and maybe you'll get some respect.
